calculator

Class ElapsedTimeCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculator.ElapsedTimeCalculator

  • public class ElapsedTimeCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class taking two times in military format and returns elapsed time in minutes and hours also minutes or hours separately
